text: Weapons of mass destruction are weapons that can cause a lot of damage to many people. In general, people see the following as weapons of mass destruction: *Chemical weapons, like poisonous gases and substances (e.g. nerve agents) *Biological weapons. Those are usually germs, or other small living things that may cause a disease. Examples are smallpox or anthrax. *Nuclear weapons == Related pages == * CBRNE (Chemical, Biological, Radiological, Nuclear, and Explosive) weapons Category:Weapons
title: Weapon of mass destruction
